text:
Allow the woman to be up and about as soon as she feels strong enough.
• After uncomplicated CD, give oral fluids and a light meal as soon as the woman feels hungry.
• Call a doctor if there are abnormalities: consider transfer from a CHC to hospital.
• A doctor’s ward round must ideally be done at least once daily.
• The mother may be discharged on the second day (but at least 48 hours after the CD) after an uncomplicated
caesarean section, if all observations are normal, as above for vaginal
